name: Enduro Racer
description:
Jump Into the World of Enduro Racing....

Based on the popular arcade coin op, Enduro Racer has been described as "The most faithful and compelling coin op conversion seen (Sinclair User) and "The Best coin op conversion available" (Popular Computing Weekly).

From tarmac tracks to desert trails Enduro Racer is a stunning motorbike race pitting you against time as you compete with deadly opponents and the cruel and challenging terrain.
